Blog.post: today is my last match in tis c gal team so sad really don wish to b apart but nvm! hmm today isnt a gd luck day for mi i sprain my leg now swollen until very big haha! some more i very lazy to walk out to see doc so nv go see also nobody go with mi see doc! we lost so only able to get 4th in the national level haiz! today get back my sci test only got 19.5/30 haiz! nvm try to do better the next tym can le! haiz i now very tired trying to matchmake ppl up haha! gtg le! tml mayb go see cboy match! haha! but my leg haiz! hope they will win!

hmm today got trainin on sunday! very tired at first don wan to wake up de but still wake up cannot don wake up haiz! train until very tired! very fast trainin no more le one more wk! today min ru n mi keep laughin one! laugh at mirror, laugh at Bises, laugh at alot things haha she say wan to bake cookiess for us donno whether got poison one anot she still say bake for her rosan! haha! today still got say abt tat lynn thingk! tat min ru also crazy de la :p haha wan mi make lynn angry haha! hope tml test can pass! haha i think i will stop here! next tym then continue ba mus go study!

haha today match against AES we won the score is 17:7. haiz but got hit super pain but nv de very fast will ok de [hope so ba] abit swellon!! haha i everytym hit ppl one then today got hit now know how pain le. but today pitcher also donno y lyk tat de! hope nxt tym will be better. haiz but b4 the match see ppl tat i don lyk sspolit my mood! ppl i know should know who i m saying abt!tat person keep flirting with every guy she see ARGH!!! haha don care abt her le la! hmm today also almost got punish think no math lesson cause thought don need to attent one but in the end mus go for the lesson for half of it de! then faster go borrow for bises haha! he still tell mi tat he say loud infront of her[admirer of bises] tat he lend mi! haha wan to die wan him! but nvm we both say n agree can use each other name dde! then mi n tat ... gal lyk enemies lyk tat haha! keep avoid her! alot ppl see her will spoilt mood one! sorry to say tat really! hm i think i stop here la don say too much le i wan to go sleep very tired! tml will be a better day for mi :P

today still not bad la got training but very tired! play with mr lee throw here throw there one! but haiz got so many test today! haha but the geo test get those qestions from joce one so still not bad la :p after trainin go mac eat eat talk talk! haha but in the mornin so shock also donno y! :) haha today also listen to gossip lyk tat also sat abit hehe! get to know those very gossip things one hehe! hmmm tml got chinese spelling, n haha got match with AES hope to hav a gd game with the sch but after all really hope to get into the finals to fight over the champ place [really realy hope for tat day] hope tml pitching will be lyk against FTP one!! muS!!! hhehhe ;P think i shall end here le! wish u ppl n myself gd luck! :)
